sourcesContent:
Sample Stocks
{{stock}}
import { DecimalPipe } from '@angular/common'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stocks', templateUrl: './stocks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stocks.component.css'] }) export class StocksComponent { stocks: any= [ "Apple Inc. (AAPL)", "Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL)", "Microsoft Corporation(MSFT)", "Amazon.com Inc. (AMZN)", "Tesla Inc. (TSLA)" ] } export interface StocksDetails { title: string, symbol: string, currentPrice: DecimalPipe, pastPrice:PriceHistory } export interface PriceHistory { price: DecimalPipe, timeStamp:string }
